endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all backups stored within the system.
Initiate and create a new data backup for the organization.
Remove a specific backup identified by its ID from the storage.
Request the restoration process for a specific backup.
Get the current health and operational status of the storage system.
Update metadata or settings associated with a specific backup.
Retrieve a list of audit logs to track actions performed on the backups.
Update the configuration settings for backup operations.
Obtain summarized analytics regarding storage usage and trends.
Perform validation checks on a specific backup to ensure data integrity.
